text: Paul Kaba Thieba (born 28 July 1959) is a Burkinabe economist. He was the Prime Minister of Burkina Faso from 2016 to 2019. Thieba was appointed by President Roch Marc Christian Kaboré on 6 January 2016. . . ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Africa ==References== Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:Economists Category:Burkinabé scientists Category:Prime ministers of Burkina Faso
title: Paul Kaba Thieba
